Ensure that the caller has the necessary permissions to accept the escrow.","params":{"escrowID":"The unique identifier of the escrow agreement to be accepted."}},"CreateEscrow(string,address,address,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint8)":{"details":"This function allows a user to create an escrow contract with a recipient, token, and other details.      The token is currently limited to USDT only.","params":{"amountInUSDT":"The amount of USDT tokens to be held in escrow.","deadline":"The timestamp (in seconds) by which the escrow must be completed.","detailsURI":"A URI pointing to the details of the escrow agreement.","disputeType":"The type of dispute resolution mechanism to be used for this escrow.","feeinPPM":"The fee for the escrow service, specified in parts per million (PPM).","toAddress":"The address of the recipient who will receive the funds upon successful completion.","tokenAddress":"The address of the token contract (currently limited to USDT)."}},"RefundEscrow(uint256)":{"details":"This function allows the creator of the escrow to refund the funds if the escrow has expired.      Ensure that the caller is the creator of the escrow and the escrow is in the correct state.","params":{"escrowID":"The unique identifier of the escrow agreement to be refunded."}},"ReleaseEscrow(uint256)":{"details":"This function allows the creator of the escrow to Released the funds if the escrow has successful submission.      Ensure that the caller is the creator of the escrow and the escrow is in the correct state.","params":{"escrowID":"The unique identifier of the escrow agreement to be refunded."}},"SubmitEscrow(uint256,string)":{"details":"This function allows a user to submit a URI containing details      or metadata related to the escrow.","params":{"escrowID":"The unique identifier of the escrow.","submissionURI":"The URI containing the submission details for the escrow."}},"constructor":{"custom:oz-upgrades-unsafe-allow":"constructor"},"owner()":{"details":"Returns the address of the current owner."},"proxiableUUID()":{"details":"Implementation of the ERC-1822 {proxiableUUID} function. This returns the storage slot used by the implementation. It is used to validate the implementation's compatibility when performing an upgrade. IMPORTANT: A proxy pointing at a proxiable contract should not be considered proxiable itself, because this risks bricking a proxy that upgrades to it, by delegating to itself until out of gas. Thus it is critical that this function revert if invoked through a proxy. This is guaranteed by the `notDelegated` modifier."},"renounceOwnership()":{"details":"Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner."},"transferOwnership(address)":{"details":"Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner."},"upgradeToAndCall(address,bytes)":{"custom:oz-upgrades-unsafe-allow-reachable":"delegatecall","details":"Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`, and subsequently execute the function call encoded in `data`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. /lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/StorageSlot.sol":{"keccak256":"0xcf74f855663ce2ae00ed8352666b7935f6cddea2932fdf2c3ecd30a9b1cd0e97","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://9f660b1f351b757dfe01438e59888f31f33ded3afcf5cb5b0d9bf9aa6f320a8b","dweb:/ipfs/QmarDJ5hZEgBtCmmrVzEZWjub9769eD686jmzb2XpSU1cM"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts-upgradeable/lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/introspection/IERC165.sol":{"keccak256":"0x8891738ffe910f0cf2da09566928589bf5d63f4524dd734fd9cedbac3274dd5c","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://971f954442df5c2ef5b5ebf1eb245d7105d9fbacc7386ee5c796df1d45b21617","dweb:/ipfs/QmadRjHbkicwqwwh61raUEapaVEtaLMcYbQZWs9gUkgj3u"]},"src/EscrowPayment.sol":{"keccak256":"0x48d228a9724f75d500a9eea9be46e8dac9712f985b91b5c0ed2e25f528967fb1","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://aa7a4ddaf86f39df076fa7c9b6ad0585ecd165e10075eba4ae8bbebcb3f05369","dweb:/ipfs/QmS5PkacjCPVsYJhM78h4EkpCnGje9idUyfvN8yyrHcmmi"]},"src/Interfaces/ITomiDispute.sol":{"keccak256":"0x921cef2c09ae5556112eeb2cd789dc3c76c16b45ad4515331851358e9cf48b1a","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://aa56f10d57daf4dccb82beef07a7d37737608e1aa0a107928c3e8c827bd182b4","dweb:/ipfs/QmSnJmdsJC2sdQwLG7XEC7BxMoihMkpcsHnidYc5h3JzhE"]}},"version":1}

AcceptEscrow(uint256).details: This function allows a user to accept an existing escrow agreement.      Ensure that the caller has the necessary permissions to accept the escrow.

params.escrowID: The unique identifier of the escrow agreement to be accepted.

CreateEscrow(string,address,address,uint.details: This function allows a user to create an escrow contract with a recipient, token, and other details.      The token is currently limited to USDT only.

params.amountInUSDT: The amount of USDT tokens to be held in escrow.
params.deadline: The timestamp (in seconds) by which the escrow must be completed.
params.detailsURI: A URI pointing to the details of the escrow agreement.
params.disputeType: The type of dispute resolution mechanism to be used for this escrow.
params.feeinPPM: The fee for the escrow service, specified in parts per million (PPM).
params.toAddress: The address of the recipient who will receive the funds upon successful completion.
params.tokenAddress: The address of the token contract (currently limited to USDT).

RefundEscrow(uint256).details: This function allows the creator of the escrow to refund the funds if the escrow has expired.      Ensure that the caller is the creator of the escrow and the escrow is in the correct state.

params.escrowID: The unique identifier of the escrow agreement to be refunded.

ReleaseEscrow(uint256).details: This function allows the creator of the escrow to Released the funds if the escrow has successful submission.      Ensure that the caller is the creator of the escrow and the escrow is in the correct state.

params.escrowID: The unique identifier of the escrow agreement to be refunded.

SubmitEscrow(uint256,string).details: This function allows a user to submit a URI containing details      or metadata related to the escrow.

params.escrowID: The unique identifier of the escrow.
params.submissionURI: The URI containing the submission details for the escrow.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

proxiableUUID().details: Implementation of the ERC-1822 {proxiableUUID} function. This returns the storage slot used by the implementation. It is used to validate the implementation's compatibility when performing an upgrade. IMPORTANT: A proxy pointing at a proxiable contract should not be considered proxiable itself, because this risks bricking a proxy that upgrades to it, by delegating to itself until out of gas. Thus it is critical that this function revert if invoked through a proxy. This is guaranteed by the `notDelegated` modifier.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

upgradeToAndCall(address,bytes).details: Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`, and subsequently execute the function call encoded in `data`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event.

AcceptEscrow(uint256).notice: Accepts an escrow agreement with the given escrow ID.

CreateEscrow(string,address,address,uint.notice: Creates a new escrow agreement with the specified parameters.

RefundEscrow(uint256).notice: Refunds an escrow agreement with the given escrow ID.

ReleaseEscrow(uint256).notice: Release an escrow agreement with the given escrow ID.

SubmitEscrow(uint256,string).notice: Submits the details of an escrow identified by its ID.
